alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 10:42PM MDT until March 17 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches below 8500 feet and 6 to 10 inches above 8500 feet. * WHERE...the Sangre De Cristo and Wet Mountains, the Wet Mountain Valley and western and central Fremont county. * WHEN...From 6 PM Wednesday to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snow packed roads. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility over La Veta Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
